Name: Thunderbolt 2
About the game: In Thunderbolt 2 you play the role of something flying through the long corridors. The main task is to shoot down objects thereby collecting fuel, which very quickly ends. To avoid collisions with other figures and go to the coveted finish. This time you can get some relax in this stylish symmetry puzzle game. - 10 longride levels. - Controls with mouse clicks.
